text.div:
SaraAlert

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://saraalert.org/ImplementationGuide/saraalert-fhir

resource.name: Sara Alert Immunization Profile
resource.description: The Sara Alert Immunization profile represents a vaccination of a monitoree.

resource.name: Sara Alert Observation Profile
resource.description: The Sara Alert Observation profile represents a monitoree lab result.

resource.name: Sara Alert Patient Profile
resource.description: Sara Alert outputs additional extensions on Patient resources

resource.name: Sara Alert Provenance Profile
resource.description: The Sara Alert Provenance profile represents a monitoree history item.

resource.name: Sara Alert QuestionnaireResponse Profile
resource.description: The Sara Alert QuestionnaireResponse profile represents a monitoree daily report.

resource.name: Sara Alert RelatedPerson Profile
resource.description: The Sara Alert RelatedPerson profile represents a close contact of a monitoree.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Destination
resource.description: Represents destination of the monitoree’s planned travel.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Destination Country
resource.description: Represents destination country of the monitoree’s planned travel.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Destination State
resource.description: Represents destination state of the monitoree’s planned travel.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel End Date
resource.description: Represents the date that the monitoree is planning to end their additional travel.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Notes
resource.description: Represents any additional notes about the monitoree’s planned travel. This can include details about the nature of the trip, planned social interaction, additional destinations, etc.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Port of Departure
resource.description: Represents the airport, station, or docking point that the monitoree is planning to travel from.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Start Date
resource.description: Represents the date that the monitoree is planning to begin their additional travel.

resource.name: Additional Planned Travel Type
resource.description: Represents type of additional planned travel the monitoree has reported (options are: `Domestic` and `International`).

resource.name: Address Type
resource.description: Indicates if a monitoree's address is within the USA, or outside of the USA (options are: `USA`, `Foreign`, `Monitored` and `ForeignMonitored`). The extension only has meaning when used on the 'Patient.address' element. If this extension is not present the address is assumed to be within the USA.

resource.name: Assigned User
resource.description: Represents the user or group within a jurisdiction responsible for monitoring a monitoree.

resource.name: Case Status
resource.description: Represents if a monitoree meets a case definition (options are: `Confirmed`, `Probable`, `Suspect`, `Unknown`, and `Not a Case`).

resource.name: Closed At
resource.description: Represents the date and time that a monitoree was manually closed by a user or automatically closed by the system. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Comment
resource.description: Represents the comment for a monitoree history item.

resource.name: Common Exposure Cohort
resource.description: Represents where common exposure cohorts for the monitoree.

resource.name: Contact Attempts
resource.description: Represents the number of times that a close contact of a monitoree has been contacted.

resource.name: Contact Of Known Case
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree has known exposure to a probable or confirmed case.

resource.name: Continuous Exposure
resource.description: Indicates if a monitoree's exposure to one or more cases is ongoing. This type of exposure means there is no known 'Last Date of Exposure'

resource.name: Created At
resource.description: This field represents the date and time that a resource was created in the system. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Crew on Passenger or Cargo Flight
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree works on a passenger, cargo, or other commercial plane.

resource.name: Date of Arrival
resource.description: Represents when the monitoree entered the United States after travel.

resource.name: Date of Departure
resource.description: Represents the date that the monitoree traveled from the Port of Origin to the United States.

resource.name: End of Monitoring
resource.description: Represents the system calculated end of monitoring period. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Enrolled Patient
resource.description: References the monitoree that corresponds to the close contact, if such a monitoree exists.

resource.name: Expected Purge Date
resource.description: Represents the date and time that the monitoree's identifiers will be eligible to be purged from the system. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Exposure Notes
resource.description: Represents any additional notes about the monitoree’s exposure history or case information history. This can include details about the interaction with a known case, high risk activities, common exposure, etc.

resource.name: Exposure Risk Assessment
resource.description: Indicates the risk assessment of a a monitoree's exposure to disease (options are: `High`, `Medium`, `Low`, `No Identified Risk`).

resource.name: Exposure Risk Factors
resource.description: Represents the exposure risk factors for the monitoree.

resource.name: Extended Isolation
resource.description: Represents a user-defined date that determines eligibility for a monitoree appearing on the Records Requiring Review linelist.

resource.name: Flight or Vessel Carrier
resource.description: Represents the carrier, operating company, or provider of the flight or vessel.

resource.name: Flight or Vessel Number
resource.description: Represents the plane, train, ship, or other vessel that the monitoree used to travel to their destination.

resource.name: Follow-up Note
resource.description: Specifies additional details for the follow-up reason on the monitoree.

resource.name: Follow-up Reason
resource.description: Specifies a reason to follow up on the monitoree (options are: `Deceased`, `Duplicate`, `High-Risk`, `Hospitalized`, `In Need of Follow-up`, `Lost to Follow-up`, `Needs Interpretation`, `Quality Assurance`, `Refused Active Monitoring`, and `Other`).

resource.name: Full Assigned Jurisdiction Path
resource.description: Represents the jurisdiction in which this monitoree is enrolled.

resource.name: Head of Household
resource.description: This field indicates if the monitoree is a head of household. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Healthcare Personnel
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree works in a healthcare facility.

resource.name: History Type
resource.description: Represents the history type for a monitoree history item.

resource.name: ID of Reporter
resource.description: Represents the ID of the monitoree that is responsible of reporting on a monitoree’s behalf. This field is read-only.

resource.name: International Telephone
resource.description: Indicates if a monitoree's telephone number is international. The extension only has meaning when used on the 'Patient.telecom' element. If this extension is not present the telecom is assumed not to be international.

resource.name: Isolation
resource.description: If the monitoree should be in the isolation workflow (omitting this extension defaults this value to false, leaving the monitoree in the exposure workflow.

resource.name: Laboratory Personnel
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree works in a laboratory or testing facility.

resource.name: Last Assessment Reminder Sent
resource.description: This field represents the date and time that a report reminder was last sent to a monitoree. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Last Date of Exposure
resource.description: When the monitoree`s last exposure occurred for use in the Sara Alert exposure workflow.

resource.name: Member of a Common Exposure Cohort
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree was exposed via a common source or gathering.

resource.name: Monitoring Plan
resource.description: Represents the monitoring approach selected by public health based on CDC or local guidance (options are: `None`, `Daily active monitoring`, `Self-monitoring with public health supervision`, `Self-monitoring with delegated supervision`, `Self-observation`).

resource.name: Notes
resource.description: Represents general notes used to describe a close contact of a monitoree.

resource.name: Original ID
resource.description: Indicates the id of the original comment before any edits were made. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Paused Notifications
resource.description: This field indicates if the monitoree has notifications paused. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Phone Type
resource.description: Represents the type of phone attached to the phone number. This field can be used to determine a monitoree’s ability to receive SMS Texted Weblink, Telephone call, or SMS Text-message during the selection of Preferred Reporting Method (options are: `Smartphone`, `Landline`, `Plain Cell`).

resource.name: Port of Entry into USA
resource.description: Represents the U.S. airport, station, or docking point that the monitoree traveled to in order to enter the United States.

resource.name: Port of Origin
resource.description: Represents the airport, station, or docking point that the monitoree traveled from.

resource.name: Potential Exposure Country
resource.description: Represents a description of the country where the monitoree was potentially last exposed to a case.

resource.name: Potential Exposure Location
resource.description: Represents a description of the location where the monitoree was potentially last exposed to a case.

resource.name: Preferred Contact Method
resource.description: Represents the form in which the monitoree receives their daily symptom reports (options are: `E-mailed Web Link`, `SMS Texted Weblink`, `Telephone call`, and `SMS Text-message`).

resource.name: Preferred Contact Time
resource.description: Represents the time period that the system sends out symptom reports to a monitoree (options are: `Morning`, `Afternoon`, `Evening`).

resource.name: Public Health Action
resource.description: Indicates the public health recommendation for a monitoree (options are: `None`, `Recommended medical evaluation of symptoms`, `Document results of medical evaluation`, `Recommended laboratory testing`).

resource.name: Reason for Closure
resource.description: Represents the reason a monitoree was closed by the user or system. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Sexual Orientation
resource.description: Represents how the monitoree characterizes their attraction to others.

resource.name: Source Of Report
resource.description: Represents where initial information about the monitoree’s exposure or illness was obtained from.

resource.name: Status
resource.description:
For monitorees in the Exposure workflow, this field represents the line list, where the monitoree
is being monitored (options are: `asymptomatic`, `symptomatic`, `non reporting`, `under investigation = PUI`, and `closed`).

For monitorees in the Isolation workflow, this field represents the monitoree’s preliminarily met
recovery definition. If the monitoree has not met a preliminary recovery definition,
then this field indicates the line list where the monitoree is being monitored
(options are: `symp non test based`, `asymp non test based`, `test based`, `reporting`, `non reporting`, and `closed`).
This field is read-only.

resource.name: Symptom Onset Date
resource.description: When the monitoree`s first symptoms appeared for use in the Sara Alert isolation workflow.

resource.name: Symptomatic
resource.description: This field indicates if the monitoree has reported symptoms that need review by a public health user. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Transfer
resource.description: Represents a transfer event involving the monitoree. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Travel From Affected Country or Area
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree traveled from a country or area with a high prevalence of disease within the exposure period.

resource.name: Travel Related Notes
resource.description: Represents any additional notes about the monitoree’s travel history. This can include details about the nature of the trip, contact with anyone symptomatic, original country departed from, etc.

resource.name: User Defined Symptom Onset
resource.description: This field indicates if a user manually defined symptom onset for the monitoree. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Was in Health Care Facility with Known Cases
resource.description: Represents whether or not a monitoree entered or was treated in a health care facility that had known cases.

resource.name: Who Reported
resource.description: System assigned value for the monitoree or user that submitted a report. This field is read-only.

resource.name: Sara Alert Language ValueSet
resource.description:
This ValueSet lists the allowed values for setting "Primary Language" and "Secondary Language"
in Sara Alert. Either the "Code" value or the "Display" value may be used. In cases where the 2-letter
ISO 639-1 code is listed, the corresponding 3-letter ISO 639-2 code may also be used.
